text: 12:10 Akar Mogomem 22:11Eghtɨ bizir kaba otiv gumazamizibar amutɨ me arazir aghuibar amuam. Egh me Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham. Egh gumazamizir fofozir aghuiba ko nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itir kaba, merara bizir kamɨn mɨngarim gɨfogham. Eghtɨ gumazamizir kuraba me bizir kamɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghan kogham. Egh me arazir kurar avɨrim damuam.
